channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Warren Buffett shocks shareholders by announcing his intention to retire at the end of the year
item.description: Buffett said he will recommend to Berkshire Hathaway’s board that Greg Abel should become CEO at the end of the year.

item.title: Warren Buffett’s best and worst investments in his 60 years leading Berkshire Hathaway
Musk gets his Texas wish. SpaceX launch site is approved as the new city of Starbase
